Class IssueListItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mk4droid.IMC_Constructors.IssueListItem

  • public class IssueListItem
extends Object
    Construct an object containing information to display in the list of issues
    Author:
    Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).
